job1.title: Mobile Developer & Data Analyst
description: Mobile Development: Designed and implemented new features in mobile applications using React Native, focusing on performance optimization and user experience (UX/UI).

Data Engineering: Acted as a data analyst, building and orchestrating automated and scalable data pipelines (ETL) using Python and Apache Airflow, ensuring data integrity and availability for decision-making.

Quality & DevOps: Established code quality standards through advanced Git and GitHub management. Implemented branching strategies (Git Flow), thorough code reviews, and collaborative workflows to synchronize distributed teams.

Critical Incident Mitigation (DDoS): Immediately responded to and resolved an active DDoS attack. Applied hacking techniques and traffic analysis to identify the attack vector and configured Cloudflare on-the-fly (I'm Under Attack Mode, Rate Limiting, and WAF rules), successfully mitigating 99% of malicious traffic and restoring service availability within minutes.

job2.title: Technical Consultant and Mentor
description: Consulting: Provided custom technical solutions for various clients, focusing on refactoring legacy code to improve its maintainability and scalability.
Mentorship: Led training for junior developers, instructing them in clean architectures, design patterns, and professional use of version control systems.
Optimization: Analyzed and improved development workflows, reducing technical debt and accelerating delivery times.

job3.title: Full-stack Developer
description: System Modernization: Led the migration of legacy platforms to modern Single Page Application (SPA) architectures using ReactJS and Redux, significantly improving interface speed and responsiveness.
Backend & Microservices: Developed robust services for international applications (such as Mesadoko) using Node.js, Express, and Prisma, implementing a modular microservices architecture.
Secure Infrastructure: Strengthened application security by implementing DDoS attack protections and configured CI/CD pipelines for automated and secure deployments.

job4.title: Technical Lead
description: Product Management: Directed the complete development lifecycle of RCService, a comprehensive administrative solution for real estate management.

Multi-platform Development: Built the complete ecosystem: a scalable RESTful API, an administrative web panel, and a native mobile application, ensuring real-time synchronization across all platforms.
